import { Employee } from '@/module/employee'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-basic-details-form', templateUrl: './basic-details-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./basic-details-form.component.scss'] }) export class BasicDetailsFormComponent implements OnInit{ employee: Employee = new Employee(); ngOnInit() { } on_click_basic_details_form(){ alert("button press: "+ this.employee.epf_no+", "+this.employee.first_name) } }
